en: Peppa is going to her first ballet lesson.
zh: 佩奇去上她的第一节芭蕾舞课。

en: This is Madame Gazelle, the ballet teacher.
zh: 这是羚羊夫人，芭蕾舞老师。

en: Ah, ho! You must be young Peppa.
Welcome to your first lesson of the ballet.
zh: 欢迎你来上第一节芭蕾舞课。

en: Candy Cat, Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog,Rebecca Rabbit, and Pedro Pony.
zh: 小猫凯迪，小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，小兔瑞贝卡和小马佩德罗。

en: Children, today we have a new pupil, Peppa Pig.
zh: 孩子们，今天我们有个新同学，佩奇。

en: Now Peppa, run and join your friends.
zh: 现在，佩奇去你朋友们那吧。
孩子们，我们开始练习半蹲。

en: Now a Little jump, petit jete.
zh: 现在练习小跳，脚交织式跳跃。

en: With grace and beauty. Petit jete!
zh: 动作要优雅和美丽。 脚交织式跳跃！

en: The ballet lesson is a lot of fun!
zh: 芭蕾舞课真是太有意思了！

en: Imagine that you are beautiful swans!
zh: 想象你们是一只漂亮的天鹅！

en: And what noise do you think a swan might make?
zh: 你们觉得天鹅的声音是怎么样的呢？

en: Mummy! Mummy! We all danced as swans!
zh: 妈妈！妈妈！我们都像天鹅一样跳舞啊！

en: I had to dance beautifully and gracefully!
zh: 我要跳得既漂亮又优雅才行！

en: Can I show you how I did it?
zh: 我给你看看是怎么跳的吧？

en: Then you can show Daddy Pig, and George, and me.
zh: 然后你再跳给爸爸，乔治和我看。

en: Peppa and Mummy Pig are home!
I'm going to show you how to do ballet!
zh: 我要让你们看看怎么跳芭蕾舞！

en: But you, George, and Mummy will find it very hard.
zh: 但对于你，乔治和妈妈就很难了。

en: Good. Now, George, Daddy and Mummy,you must copy what I do.
zh: 好了。现在，乔治，爸爸和妈妈，你们必须照我的动作来做。
羚羊夫人用了一些好笑的词。

en: But really, it's just bending your knees and jumping.
zh: 但是其实，只是弯起你的膝盖然后跳起来。

en: Daddy! You know the funny words!
zh: 爸爸！你居然知道那个好笑的词！

en: Mummy Pig and I used to be quite good at ballet!
zh: 猪妈妈和我以前芭蕾舞跳得很好的！

en: Our favorite was the pas de deux!
zh: 我们最喜欢的舞是双人舞！

en: Ooofff! That wasn't quite how I remembered it.
zh: 喔！我记得好像不是这样的。

en: Maybe we should leave the ballet to Peppa!
zh: 或许我们还是让佩奇来表演芭蕾舞吧！

en: Yes, I am the best at it!
